==Event Menu==
{{Description|The desert's border stretches on. Legend has it that between the countless scimitar-shaped ravines that cut across the desert plain, a lost city of old lies hidden with a wandering tribe seeking refuge in its ruins.<br />Perhaps among the incessant sandstorms that seem to erode all things encompassed by history, a story lost in time awaits to be uncovered...}}
[[File:Desert of Hadramaveth Event Menu.png|400px]]
* If the player has not completed the prerequisite [[World Quest]], the "Initiate Quest" button has notice added with:
** It is recommended that you complete "[[Golden Slumber]]" and accept "[[The Dirge of Bilqis]]" first before exploring

==Trivia==
* Desert of Hadramaveth currently has the most subareas of any area, with a total of 12.
===Etymology===
* Hadramaveth may be derived from {{Lang|''{{w|Hadramaut}}''|ar=حَضْرَمُوتُ/حَضْرَمَوْتُ}}, a region in South Arabia. The most common folk etymology is that the name means "death has come".
